body.p:
Maysville, Ky,
April 15, 1865,
James R. Page, Esqr,
Asst Secy of State,

Sir We send you pursuant to your instructions, four dollars to pay fees upon the remission of the forfeitures against us in the cases of Young & Wells, which the Governor has been kind enough to grant,
The cases are pending in the Lewis Circuit Court, and there are two bonds to each of which our names are attached as sureties, one is against William Young, and the other vs. Thomas Wells.
Please send the certificates of remission to us at Maysville, Ky,

p.note: The bonds are only forfeited and there are no judgments upon the forfeiture, The remission can be against the forfeiture.
